name: The Shifty, Twisty Forest (Prototype)
description:
You're a tortoise lost in a shifting, twisting forest. Help the tortoise reach the key and take it to the door to make it out of the forest. Tap/click on the portions of the forest to shift or flip them.

This is a quick prototype we (Gopherwood Studios) threw together. If you like it, let us know and maybe we'll flesh it out into something a little bigger.

Thanks for playing!

Twitter - @Gopherwood

Email - feedback@gopherwoodstudios.com
